com.scriptedmc.script.inventory

Class SMCInventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scriptedmc.script.inventory.SMCInventory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProxyArray, ProxyObject

    public class SMCInventory
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProxyArray, ProxyObject
    Any inventory (block inventory for example) Script array with `update()` method to send changes to client Example use (Javascript): 
         var inventory = block.inventory;
     print(inventory[5].id);
     inventory[3] = new SMCItemStack("minecraft:cookie", 5);
     inventory.update();
